main.name: James Lungu
main.description: I'm always looking for opportunities to apply what I learned in the classroom to some real-world problems
main.bio: I'm a fourth-year student at Stony Brook University studying Computer Science with a Minor in Chemistry. I have always been very passionate about Science & Math, and started my Computer Science journey in my freshman year of college! Outside of my classes I served as a Teaching Assistant in various Computer Science and Chemsitry classes at Stony Brook, am a member of the Stony Brook Marching Band, and of the Stony Brook Investment Club. My interests include Coding, Algorithms/Algorithm Design, Data Analysis, Financial Analysis. In my spare time, I like to code, read, play a video game or play the guitar! Scroll to see more about me, my projects, and what I can do!
